    Education

    Research Interests

    Publications

    • Javid Norouzi, Mohammad Sadegh Helfroush, Alireza Liaghat, and Habibollah Danyali. ” A Deep Learning Based Two-Stage Approach for Multi-Descriptor Feature Extraction and Matching of SAR Images: Applications on ImageRegistration (Under Review).”Expert Systems With Applications

    • Alireza Liaghat, Mohammad Sadegh Helfroush, Javid Norouzi, and Habibollah Danyali. ”Airborne SAR to Optical Image Registration Based on SAR Geo-Referencing and Deep Learning Approach.” IEEE Sensors Journal (2023).

    • Javid Norouzi, Alireza Liaghat, Mohammad Sadegh Helfroush, and Habibollah Danyali. ”VGG16-based Feature Fusion For Image Kyepoint Description (In Press)” In 2023 31st International Conference on Electrical Engineering

    • Javid Norouzi, Alireza Liaghat, Mohammad Sadegh Helfroush, and Habibollah Danyali. ”A Novel Deep Learning Framework For Image KeyPoint Description.” In 2022 12th International Conference on Computer and Knowledge Engineering (ICCKE), pp. 332-336. IEEE, 2022.

      Selected Projects

      • Quadratic Mirror Filter Bank Demo
        • A graphical interface for applying filters to discrete signals in real time in C++. A quadratic mirror filter bank wasused, and the graphical interface was implemented using Qt and QML. This project was a part of the ADSP course. github.com/ShowStopperTheSecond/QMFB
      • Finger Print Verification on Low-quality Images
        • Enhancing fingerprint ridges on different angles to help better verification of low-quality fingerprint images. This was part of the Digital Image Processing course. github.com/ShowStopperTheSecond/FingerPringRidges
      • Image WaterMarking By Using Pseudo Random Sequences
        • Hiding a watermark in digital art imagery to track their ownership with the minimum loss in quality. This was part of the image watermarking course. github.com/ShowStopperTheSecond/imgWaterMarking
      • Presence Logger
        • A presence logger using Arduino and fingerprint sensors. The designed logger could record the entry and departure times of employees. This was the summer internship project I took at TechVico, a startup to create smart wheelchairs for disabled patients.
      • 5G Antenna
        • The final bachelor project involving the design of a 5G antenna using the High-Frequency Structure Simulator (HFSS). The designed antenna could show a good gain in the 5G frequency band.

      Honors and Awards

      • Ranked 3rd among graduate master students of System Telecommunications (Shiraz, Iran, 2022)

      • The 1st team IPCC(International Programming Collegiate Contest) at the University of Birjand (Birjand, Iran, 2018)

      • The 1st team IPCC(International Programming Collegiate Contest) at the University of Birjand (Birjand, Iran, 2017)

      • The 1st place in programming competitions under 15 years old in Shiraz district, 1 (Shiraz, Iran, 2009)
